mapper.select: SELECT 案例ID as caseContractNo ,NULL as caseCommunityName ,NULL as caseOpeningDate ,成交时间 as caseClosingDate ,"租金（元/月）" as caseRentPrice ,面积 as caseArea ,总楼层 as caseTotalFloor ,朝向 as caseToward ,室厅 as caseApartmentLayout ,NULL as caseDecoration ,AIID as caseCommunityId ,楼栋ID as caseBuildingId FROM dbo.住宅租赁成交案例_链家_${yearMonth}
